name: Sure Cuts A Lot Version 4 Project
summary: Learn about .SCUT4 files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Sure Cuts A Lot is an app that allows you to import artwork and create custom designs, then cut them with electronic cutting machines. The SCUT4 file is the primary file type associated with version 4 of Sure Cuts A Lot.

Each version of Sure Cuts A Lot saves projects with a .scut file extension and a number indicating the version of Sure Cuts A Lot that created it. For example, version 3 of Sure Cuts A Lot creates a project with the .scut3 file extension.

instructions: You can open a SCUT4 with Craft Edge Sure Cuts A Lot (version 4 or later). For example, to open a SCUT4 file with version 4 of Sure Cuts A Lot, select File → Open Project.
Craft Edge Easy Cut Studio (version 4 or later) can also open SCUT4 files. To open a SCUT4 file with Easy Cut Studio 4, select File → Import.
Sure Cuts A Lot can convert SCUT4 files to various file types, including the following formats:

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
